Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game Class

    This class combnines all the primary components of the game. It include the hero, enemies and the cannon balls. It also provides different functionality such as checking for collision and updating and painting primary game components.

    Instance Variables:

    hero: hero instance

    enemyList: list that contains all the enemy objects

    cannonBallList: list that contains all the cannnoBall objects

    animationList: list that containts all the animation objects

    timeLastEnemyCreated: time when the last enemy was created

    timeBetweenEnemies: time between creating of enemies

    speed: speed of enemies

    Author:
    Utkarsh Lamba

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String countryPath,
            java.lang.String countryHeader,
            int speed)
        Constructor:

        The constructor instantiates the hero and ArrayList objects. It sets the enemy speed and sets initial values for time variables.

        Parameters:
        countryPath - path the text file containing the countries list
        countryHeader - file header to ensure file being read is correct
        speed - speed of the enemies

    • Method Detail

      • updateEnemy

        public void updateEnemy()
        Method public void updateEnemy()

        This method deletes and adds the enemy ships based on their position and time passed. It also sets the lives left accordingly.

      • shoot

        public void shoot()
        Method public void shoot()

        This method adds cannon balls to the list for being shot.

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision()
        Method public boolean checkCollision()

        This method is responsible for collision detection. It makes the necessary adjustments to the lists accordingly

        Returns:
        true if collision occured

      • updateExplosions

        public void updateExplosions()
        Method public void updateExplosions()

        this method is responsible for removing the animations that have been played.

      • moveHero

        public void moveHero(int speed)
        Method public void moveHero (int speed)

        This method moves the hero with the specified speed.

        Parameters:
        speed - speed of the hero
